name: Tower Hill
description:
Every now and then, I like to create things in Blender. Recently, I've been using different Blender tools to create lots of different towers. I have put these towers into a little world, so that people can walk around in, explore and climb the towers (through teleportation) and look out over the world.

If I make a sizeable amount of more towers, I will add them to this game and update it in the future.
